en: Dw i'n cael bach mwy na fy ffi gwreiddiol
vi: I get a little bit more than my fee for driving it from Germany?

en: am ddreifio fo nôl o'r Almaen?
-Ia. -I mi gael hufen iâ lawr yn y Bae
vi:
Yep!
 A little something to buy an ice cream down the Bay

en: a mynd am sbin ar y ffwjin merry-go-round?
vi: and a spin on the merry-go-rounds.
-Have you finished? -I'll take my cut now.

en: Gymra i fy cut 'wan a bydda i o dy wynt di am byth.
vi: -Then I'll be out of your hair. -Who do you think you are, boy?

en: Pwy ddiawl ti'n meddwl wyt ti, hogyn?
Mi o'dd yr Anhysbys yn mynd i gael gwared arnach chdi
vi: The Unknowns were going to get rid of you once and for all

en: unwaith ac am byth ar ôl y trip dwytha wnest ti.
Ac mi o'dd gynnon nhw rywun gwell a rhatach i gymryd dy le di.
vi: They had someone else, better and cheaper, to take your place.

en: Mi fyswn i 'di trafod yn bwyllog ac yn rhesymol efo chdi ond o, na!
vi: I would've discussed everything with you, calmly and in detail.

en: Ma' Carbo yn rhy brysur yn cael wanc efo'i ego.
vi: Carbo's too busy having a wank with his ego!

en: Cyn i mi dy lapio di'n gwlwm.
vi: Before I shut it for you.

en: Cym y day off i sortio dy hun allan.
vi: Take the day off to sort yourself out.

en: Ti'n edrych ac yn ogleuo fel taset ti
vi: You look and smell like you've just come down a sewage pipe.

en: 'di dod allan o ben peipen sewage.
Ma' gen i waith i wneud.
i drafod dy siâr yn iawn.
Ga' ni gario 'mlaen efo'r sgwrs adeg hynny.
Ma'r ysgol feithrin 'ma 'di cau am y diwrnod.
vi: This creche has closed for the day.

en: cliria gweddill dy stwff allan o gwt yr Audi 'na.
vi: clear the rest of your stuff from the boot of the Audi.

en: Fo nath achub nhw o dy garafan di.
vi: He saved your things from the caravan.

en: Felly dangosa ychydig o barch i Leswold Moore.
vi: So show Leswold Moore a bit more respect.

en: Wela i di am bump, Carbo.
vi: I'll see you at five, Carbo.

en: Iawn, Mic? Sut ma' petha lawr yn Trenchtown?
ond 'dy petha ddim 'di bod mor hawdd â be o'n i 'di dychmygu.
vi: But things haven't been as straightforward as I'd imagined.

en: Doswch i wneud panad wnewch chi, plis, Dad?
vi: Make me a cuppa will you please, Dad.

en: Wel, yn un peth, ma' isio ffrwyno'r Carbo 'na i bostyn dal eliffant.
vi: Well, for starters, Carbo needs controlling.

en: Bloody hell o'n i'n meddwl bod bob dim yn iawn
vi: Bloody hell! You said you were just "standing by for orders".

en: a ma'n barod i fynd oeddach chi?
Wel, bydd yn rhaid i Mr. Lluoedd Arbennig sortio fo allan, bydd?
vi: Well, Mr Special Forces will have to sort him out then.

en: rho'r jobyn cludo motor-beic iddo fo.
vi: give him the job of delivering the motorbike.

en: O leia ga' i weld o dros fy hun wedyn, caf?
vi: At least I can see for myself then.

en: Paid esbonio dim byd arall iddo fo ar hyn o bryd, oce?
vi: Don't explain anything else to him, okay?

en: Iawn, wel, mi gysyllta i'n fuan, oce?
vi: Right, I'll be in touch soon.

en: Ma'n rhaid i ti gael gafael ar y sampl, on'd oes e, Jiffy?
vi: You've got to get hold of the sample, Jiffy.

en: tydy'r Hustons 'ma'n delio efo cymaint o wahanol fathau o gerrig.
vi: The Hustons deal with so many different types of stones.

en: A dw i'n gorfod dewis y rhai gorau ar gyfer un trip, dydw?
vi: I have to select the best for one trip.

en: Dw i ddim yn gofyn i ti ffeindio unicorn i mi. Un jobyn, ie?
vi: I'm not asking you to find me a unicorn.

en: Dewis a dethol y cerrig gorau.
vi:
You have one job.
 To select the best stones.

en: Jobyn i'r teulu yw hon, Jiff.
vi: It's a job for the family, Jiff.

en: Ffafr i dy bartner di a'i deulu. Awtsh!
vi: A favour to your partner and his clan.

en: Pain in the ass i mi
vi: A pain in the arse for me, but there you go.

en: A ma'r bysedd yn Rolie yn tic tician.

vi: Get on with it. Over and out.

There we are.
 It's quiet here today, Mici.

en: Dw i 'di rhoi'r bore off i bawb
vi: I've given them the morning off so I can sort some things out.

en: er mwyn i mi gael cyfle i sortio pethau allan.
Wnawn nhw weithio'n hwyrach heno i wneud i fyny amdano fo.
vi: They can work late tonight to catch up.

en: Wel, ma'n rhaid i mi ddeud
vi: Oh, well, I have to say…

en: ma' Carbo 'di neud job dda o bypasio'r ignition, Les
vi: Carbo's done a good job of by-passing the ignition, Les.

en: a chael gwared o'r chassis number.
vi: And getting rid of the chassis number.

en: Be ti'n disgwyl i fi wneud? Rhoi sws mawr gwlyb iddo fo, ia?
vi: What do you expect me to do, give him a sloppy kiss?

en: A deud diolch yn fawr wrth y twat bach tenau
vi: Thank the scrawny twat for wrecking my pride and joy?

en: am falu fy pride and joy fi yn rhacs.
Dyma ni'n mynd 'mlaen a 'mlaen fatha blydi tiwn gron am y Capri 'na, Les!
vi: Stop going on and on about your bloody Capri, will you, Les!

en: O leia ma' Carbo 'di neud fel ofynnais i iddo fo.
vi: At least Carbo's done what I asked him to.

en: Ti'n disgwyl iddo fo i fod yn bart o'r trip 'ma go iawn, w'ti, Mic?
vi: Do you seriously expect him to be part of this job, Mici?

en: Unwaith geith o cyt o'i bres pnawn 'ma, wnawn ni'm gweld lliw ei din.
vi: Once he gets his cut this afternoon, we won't see him for dust.

en: Wedyn, 'dan ni'n mynd i fod up shit creek heb canw.
vi: Then we'll be up shit creek without a canoe.

en: Rho llaw i fi i gael hwn i mewn i gefn y fan 'na.
vi: Let's get this into the back of the van.

en: Oeddach chdi'n deud rhywbeth yn fan'na, Mic? Ta breuddwydio o'n i?
vi: Did you say anything, Mic, or was I just dreaming?

en: Be gei di well na pei stêc and 'lwlod, Fray Bentos.
vi: You can't beat a Fray Bentos steak and kidney pie!

en: Iasu! Ma' rhywbeth mawr yn bod efo dy berfedd di, siwr Dduw.
vi: There's something seriously wrong with your guts.

en: Nagoes siwr, ma' gen i gonstitution fel ceffyl rasio, diolch yn fawr.
vi: Bollocks. I've got the constitution of an ox, thank you very much!

en: Ma'n rhaid i mi fynd i ollwng y plant 'ma yn y pwll nofio.
vi: I've got to drop these kids off at the swimming pool.

en: Dw i 'di bod yn meddwl am betha trwy'r prynhawn
vi: I've been thinking things through all afternoon.
And as I said this morning…

en: fedra i'm gweithio efo neb sy'n delio efo...
...fedra i'm gweithio efo neb sy'n delio efo cops.

vi: and I'll get out of your way.

en: mi af i o dy wynt di.
Ti'm yn 'nabod fi ond dw i 'di clywed lot amdanach chdi.
vi: You don't know me, but I've heard a lot about you.

en: Ym, so be dach chi 'di clywed amdana i?
vi: So, what have you heard about me then?

en: ond o be dw i'n dallt, ti am godi dy bres a gadael, wyt?
vi: But from what I gather, you're going to take your money and run.

en: Ma' Mici 'di cynnig job i chdi, do?
felly ma'n amser i chdi ddangos bach o ffydd ynddom ni, yndi ddim?
vi:
So…
 isn't it time you started to trust us?
I don't want to have to…

en: Deuda i un peth wrthach chdi.
vi: I'll tell you something for nothing.

en: Wnei di'm para'n hir iawn lawr yn fan'na
vi: You won't last long down there…

en: heb Mici Finn a Les Moore yn dy warchod di.
vi: without Mici Fin and Les Moore watching over you.

en: Ma' gynna i gynnig bach i chdi.
vi: I've got an offer for you.
Okay then, I'll listen to what you've got to say.

en: Dim hogyn bach dy fam wyt ti ddim mwy, naci?
vi: You're not mummy's little boy any more.

en: Ma'n amser i chdi wynebu dy ddyfodol, yndi ddim?
vi: Isn't it time you faced your future?

en: dyna o'dd Mam yn arfer deutha i.
vi: that's what Mam used to say to me.

en: 'Dan ni genod yn dallt mwy na dach chi ddynion yn meddwl, 'sti.
vi: Us women understand more than you men realise.

en: Sa hi'n braf cael dod i 'nabod ein gilydd, bysa?
vi: It would be nice to get to know each other.

en: I fi gael cyfle i esbonio petha'n well.
vi: So I can explain things better.

en: Wneith yr hogia ddeuthach chdi be sy'n digwydd nesa, oce?
vi: The boys will tell you what happens next, okay.

en: So, be dach chi isio i fi wneud nesa?
vi:
So…
 What do you want me to do next?

en: Rwân, ti'n meddwl fedri di dosbarthu hwn yn saff
vi: Do you think you could deliver this up to North Wales for me, soon as?

en: i fyny i'r gogledd 'na i mi, soon as?
Un cwestiwn, 'mond y motor-beic dw i'n ei gario, ia?
vi: One question, it's only the bike I'm carrying, is it?
Oh, yeah, everything else is above board.

en: Mae 'na burner phone yn y glovebox. Mae 'di chargio i fyny.
vi: There's a burner phone in the glove box. It's fully charged.

en: Wna i roi y manylion i chdi ar hwnnw.
vi: I'll send you the details on that.

en: Hedia am Borthmadog a ffonia fi oddi ar y ffôn newydd pan gyrhaedda di.
vi: Head for Porthmadog and call me from that new phone when you get there.

en: Fancy a beer after this tough shift?
vi: Fancy a beer after that tough shift?

en: Gest ti afael yn hogyn Moira? Be o'dd ganddo fo i ddeutha ti?
vi: Did you get hold of Moira's boy?

What did he have to say?
 I did indeed.

en: Deith Carbo rownd, gewch chi weld.
vi: Carbo will come round, you’ll see.
